mapper.select: SELECT date_format(i.inq_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as 'inq_date', i2.invoice_cod, i2.num, i2.product_cod, (SELECT p.prodname FROM product p WHERE p.cod = i2.product_cod) as 'prodname', i2.inq_qty, i2.unitprice, i2.supprice, i2.vax, i2.total FROM invoice i JOIN invoicedetail i2 ON i.cod = i2.invoice_cod AND i2.closing = 'N' WHERE i.inv_class = '구매' AND i.inq_class = 'Y' AND i.deleteyn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invoicedetail (num, invoice_cod, mrp_cod, product_cod, inventory_cod, inv_qty, inv_mgmt_qty, unitprice, supprice, vax, total) VALUES (#{num}, #{invoiceCod}, #{mrpCod}, #{productCod}, #{inventoryCod}, #{invQty}, #{invMgmtQty}, #{unitprice}, #{supprice}, #{vax}, #{total})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT i.num, i.invoice_cod, i.mrp_cod, i2.inv_class, i.product_cod, p.prodname, i3.name AS 'invname', i.inventory_cod, i3.name AS 'invProdname', p.spec, i3.spec AS 'invSpec', m.take_date, i.inv_qty, u.name AS 'unitName', u2.name AS 'invUnitName', u3.name AS 'mgmtUnitName', u4.name AS 'invMgmtUnitName', c.name AS 'clientName', e.name AS 'employeeName', i2.inv_date, i2.inv_class, i.inv_mgmt_Qty, i2.note, i2.prod_ready FROM invoicedetail i JOIN invoice i2 ON i.invoice_cod = i2.cod JOIN product p ON i.product_cod = p.cod LEFT JOIN inventory i3 ON i.inventory_cod = i3.cod JOIN mrp m ON i.mrp_cod = m.cod JOIN unit u ON p.unit_cod = u.cod LEFT JOIN unit u2 ON i3.unit_cod = u2.cod LEFT JOIN unit u3 ON p.mgmt_unit_cod = u3.cod LEFT JOIN unit u4 ON i3.mgmt_unit_cod = u4.cod JOIN mps m2 ON m.mps_cod = m2.cod JOIN orderdetail o ON m2.order_cod = o.cod JOIN orders o2 ON o.cod = o2.cod JOIN client c ON o2.client_cod = c.cod JOIN employee e ON i2.employee_cod = e.cod WHERE i.invoice_cod = #{invoiceCod} ORDER BY i.num
mapper.update: UPDATE invoicedetail SET deleteyn = 'Y' WHERE invoice_cod = #{invoiceCod}
